<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Magus's Analysis](/Feats.aspx?ID=2847) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 42 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Spellstrike](/Actions.aspx?ID=755)

</column>

---

You make an assessment informed by your knowledge of how a creature fights. Attempt a check to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) about a creature. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your check if you previously hit the creature with a Strike this turn. If your check is successful, recharge your Spellstrike. The subject of your check is temporarily immune to Magus's Analysis for 1 day.
name: Magus's Analysis
